name: ENVELOP
intro: Cross-chain protocol providing NFTs with real value
introduce: ENVELOP is a flexible cross-chain tool set able to give any NFT new functionality (economic set-up, on-chain royalties, rental mechanism, time/value/event-locks), protection of devaluation and anti-fraud system. Project’s long term aim is cross-chain tokenization of payment channels (rollups) to intensified unused liquidity.
